# File 'app/helpers/lightbox_helper.rb', line 3

def attachment_lightbox_tag( attachment, html_options = {} )
  ( lightbox_tag( attachment.thumb_url,
                  attachment.file_url,
                  lightbox_title( attachment ),
                  "gallery" )
    ).html_safe
end
